ワニカニ 漢字地図

WaniKani Kanji Map

Enter your WaniKani API v2 token: Remember token

NOTE: You need to have a premium account on WaniKani in order to use this map.

You can get a token by going to Menu > Settings > API Tokens. In the "Personal Access Tokens" section, Click the "Generate a new token" button. On the next page, type in a description like 'wk-kanji-map', then click the "Generate token" button at the bottom of the page (leave all the permissions unchecked). Then copy and paste the token into the input field above.

Then slam that "Map Me" button and watch the Kanji Map get filled out with the kanji you learned that are Guru or higher!
